The Quranic researcher, who reassures that I am more than what I have performed, which is a repetition and a denunciation of his hearing and his burning, either because he is in a complete richness, not more than what he has given, and it is a lot of time, or for a long time, or for a long time.It is upon him from the disbelief of the blessing and the suffering of the blessing.And about the good and otherwise that he was saying if he was a righteous Muhammad, then what was created for paradise (except) to me and the domination of then to the dominance of many, and it is not the one who was not.The thing is far from other than what is appropriate for what was composed of it, as you say, you are offended to me, then you hope my charity.That was to download the mean dimension, the home of the time.
